description: Expert Advisor maintenance and support services for Tema, Ghana's major port city and industrial hub east of Accra. As the heart of Ghana's maritime trade and manufacturing, Tema attracts hardworking professionals who use automated trading to build wealth. Our EA maintenance service provides robust, reliable support matching Tema's industrial character. We serve Tema's diverse community including seaport professionals, harbor workers, manufacturing employees, logistics managers, and traders throughout this major industrial city. Your work in Tema's critical infrastructure means irregular hours - you need EA maintenance that works 24/7 without constant attention. Our comprehensive plans deliver priority developer support regardless of time, proactive monitoring preventing downtime, regular MT4/MT5 updates, monthly performance optimization, broker adaptation, and guaranteed response times. Whether you're working shifts at the port or managing a factory in Tema, our maintenance keeps your trading bots profitable. Choose from Bronze ($99/mo) for 1-2 EAs, Silver ($199/mo) for 3-5 EAs with 24hr response perfect for shift workers, or Gold ($399/mo) for unlimited EAs with round-the-clock dedicated support ideal for Tema's industrial community working around the clock.

faq.question: Why do Tema industrial workers need EA maintenance?
faq.answer: When you're working shifts at the port or factory, you can't constantly monitor trading bots. Our 24/7 service handles maintenance while you work - monitoring, updates, and optimization happening around the clock.

faq.question: Do you provide support during night shifts?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our 24/7 monitoring and support work around the clock matching Tema's industrial operations. Whether you work day, night, or swing shifts, we're always available.

faq.question: How quickly do you respond to issues in Tema?
faq.answer: Bronze: 48 hours, Silver: 24 hours, Gold: 12 hours - available 24/7. Critical live trading issues get expedited response anytime, day or night. We understand Tema operates around the clock.

faq.question: Can EAs provide additional income for port workers?
faq.answer: Yes! Many Tema maritime and industrial workers use EAs for supplemental income. Automated trading works while you're at the port or factory - our maintenance ensures systems run reliably.

faq.question: Do you support international trading brokers?
faq.answer: Yes. We work with 50+ international brokers popular globally. We handle platform requirements and ensure your EAs work reliably regardless of broker location.

faq.question: What plan works for Tema shift workers?
faq.answer: Silver ($199/mo) popular for 3-5 EAs with 24hr response available anytime. Perfect for shift workers needing support during odd hours. Gold ($399/mo) for larger portfolios with 12hr response 24/7.

faq.question: Can you maintain EAs I can't watch constantly?
faq.answer: Exactly our specialty! Automated monitoring, proactive maintenance, regular updates - all happening automatically. Perfect for Tema workers focused on demanding industrial jobs.
